command.copyDefinition.title: C++ Definition Paster: Copy Definition
command.magicCopy.title: C++ Definition Paster: Magic Copy (Select from Right to Left to Copy Definition)
config.magicCopy.enabled.title: Magic Copy Enabled
config.magicCopy.enabled.desc: Enable or disable the Magic Copy feature. When enabled, select from left to right for normal copying; select from right to left for definition copying.
config.textAfterDef.title: Text After Definition
config.textAfterDef.desc: Text to be inserted after each definition when creating one or multiple definitions.
config.textBetweenMultipleDefs.title: Text Between Multiple Definitions
config.textBetweenMultipleDefs.desc: Text to be inserted between definitions when creating multiple definitions.
config.textAfterMultipleDefs.title: Text After Multiple Definitions
config.textAfterMultipleDefs.desc: Text to be inserted at the end when creating multiple definitions.
